/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/videocapture_camera.dir/videocapture_camera.cpp.o  -o videocapture_camera -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_highgui.so.4.6.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_videoio.so.4.6.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgcodecs.so.4.6.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgproc.so.4.6.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_core.so.4.6.0
